lead_paragraph: Wladimir Klitschko retained his International Boxing Federation heavyweight title last night, stopping the American challenger Ray Austin in the second round in Mannheim, Germany. Klitschko improved his record to 48-3 with 43 knockouts.
snippet: Wladimir Klitschko retained his International Boxing Federation heavyweight title last night, stopping the American challenger Ray Austin in the second round in Mannheim, Germany. Klitschko improved his record to 48-3 with 43 knockouts.
